item.title: The Secret (of Yahoo)
item.description: In early 2016, my friend reached out to me with what seemed to be an interesting little puzzle. She began receiving a slew of emails. The emails were pretty clearly broad-targetted phishing scams and all directed at her AOL email address. over the course of a few months, she got maybe twenty-five emails, nearly identical but from unique addresses all from the Yahoo domain.

item.title: There's A Demon In My GPG Key
item.description: This is arguably an odd way to start off this blog and I doubt I'll be able to bring myself to regularly update this, but I stumbled a nice little late-night surprise on my quest to set up an email server.
